name: CreateWarpedGridImage
author: ANTs Developers
description: Create a warped grid image based on the specified deformation field.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the input image.

inputs.name: Deformation Field
inputs.description: File containing the deformation field to be applied.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The filename of the output warped grid image.

inputs.name: Directions
inputs.description: Directions for the grid warping, e.g., '1x0x0'.

inputs.name: Grid Sigma
inputs.description: Sigma value for the grid smoothing, e.g., '1x1x1'.
